attacks.name: Pick Out
attacks.effect: Choose 1 face-down Prize card (yours or your opponent's) and put it face up. If that card is a Supporter card, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (That card remains face up for the rest of the game.)

attacks.name: Jaw Bite
attacks.effect: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pok√©mon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 20 more damage.
